shnitsel.data.proxy_class
=========================

.. py:module:: shnitsel.data.proxy_class


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   shnitsel.data.proxy_class.Proxy


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Proxy(obj)

   Bases: :py:obj:`object`


   Class to wrap an object of a different kind, forward all provided functionality but also be able to insert additional behavior when certain functions are called.


   .. py:attribute:: __slots__
      :value: ['_obj', '__weakref__']



   .. py:method:: __getattribute__(name)


   .. py:method:: __delattr__(name)


   .. py:method:: __setattr__(name, value)


   .. py:method:: __nonzero__()


   .. py:method:: __str__()


   .. py:method:: __repr__()


   .. py:method:: __hash__()


   .. py:attribute:: _special_names
      :value: ['__abs__', '__add__', '__and__', '__call__', '__cmp__', '__coerce__', '__contains__',...



   .. py:method:: _create_class_proxy(theclass)
      :classmethod:


      creates a proxy for the given class
